duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expertise in talent management, organizational effectiveness, and employee engagement to support a positive work culture.
Develop and execute a 1-year business plan aligned with corporate and immediate manager’s strategic plans.
Implement talent processes, performance management, talent reviews, succession planning, and individual development plans.
Support the execution of the organizational engagement strategy, surveys, and action plans.
Provide organizational change management methodology and evaluation to ensure successful implementation and adoption of key initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in human resources, public or business administration, human resources management, or a related field (Professional certifications strongly preferred)
